dcterms:creator: Y. Lecun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits and is commonly used for training various image processing systems. In this paper, it is used to evaluate the performance of the proposed Self-Taught Associative Memory (STAM) architecture in a continual learning setting.
dcterms:title: MNIST
